Title: Requires vendors to establish mandatory escrow accounts for sales taxes collected and provide the state with the authority to have immediate access to their collected taxes; repealer
Summary: Requires vendors to establish mandatory escrow accounts for sales taxes collected, establish the mechanism for those accounts and provide the state with the authority to have immediate access to their collected taxes.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to requiring vendors to establish mandatory escrow accounts for sales taxes collected, establish the mechanism for those accounts and provide the state with the authority to have immediate access to their collected taxes; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
